title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Strengthening Critical Information Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational information retrieval skills and adaptability to digital environments
context.additional_context: Systematic information literacy development program for science job seekers, featuring self-directed mobile learning and formative assessment feedback systems

learning_goals: Learners apply judgment criteria to evaluate the credibility of scientific information with over 80% accuracy
Learners generate at least three or more critical questions while analyzing the credibility of information sources
Learners construct argumentation frameworks that present counterexamples to scientific claims and derive alternative interpretations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
